title: An Idea to give Amumu, The Sad Mummy, the wish he has always wanted
body:
Why should Draven get his own Draven Day?
And why is Amumu not invited to that Splash Art Party with Nasus, Nami, Udyr and Soraka?
And why the hell is he outside the window in the rain in the first place? Did they like, forget about him?
Why doesn't he have an AMAZING skin? Like wtf Riot. 
'Sad Robot'
'Emumu'
'Surprise Party Amumu' and he is barely even apart of that splash art

So why don't we give Amumu just ONE day to feel appreciated. 
He's like a mummy which makes him, immortal? So his gonna live a never ending life of never ending sadness?
I was thinking, on Amumu Day, something simple, something noticeable, something for the boy with no heart.

Like a splash art, doesn't have to be a skin. A splash art of Amumu surrounded by other Champions, comforting him.
                OR 
It could be like a remake of his classic, him on that wooden pole. But rather than the frown he held for so long, a 
delicate, fragile but sweet smile. 

or maybe even both. 

If Annie were really friends with Amumu, then where was she in his lore or where was he in her lore?

Just for the Sadness :
---------------------------------------------------------------
Every child in Valoran has heard the tale before,
About the cursed mummy boy who felt his heart no more.
So sad and lorn, the helpless lad, Amumu was his name,
He ventured out to find a friend and learn about his bane.

For many years, young Amumu traveled through the lands,
Determined to make friends, if only they would understand,
But even when Amumu stood upon the ledge of home,
His hope would disappoint him, and he would remain alone.

But then the curse began to whisper in his ear,
And would confirm what was Amumu's biggest fear,
It pledged that never shall someone become his friend,
It pledged that he shall be alone until his end.

The sorrow and despair,
Became too much to bear.

Yeah!
The moment when Amumu realized what he had done,
Too late it was, for him, for them, the evil curse had won.
The anger and the anguish overwhelmed his fragile soul,
And caused a wicked tantrum that he never could control._
---------------------------------------------------------------

"The worst kind of Sad, is not being able to explain why."
                                                      
 -Curiano.com
